Summary I solve business-critical network problems. When the initial lines of defense have been thwarted, I dig until the cause and solution become clear. I filter terabytes of network traffic, and write custom code to mine insights from millions of potentially relevant packets. 
 
When there are no business critical issues to solve, I build resilience in the organization by understanding core system performance and sharing that understanding with stakeholders. I particularly enjoy coaching, mentoring, and sharing insights from my two decades of experience bringing critical systems to their optimal potential.  
 
My tools of choice are Wireshark, Python, a deep understanding of networking concepts, and the intuition that can only come from years of hands-on analysis in the trenches.

nGenius Certified: Professional, Expert, Master 
Certified NetAnalyst: Level I, Level II, Cross Technology, Architect, Elite 
Certified Network Expert: Ethernet, Advanced Ethernet, Advanced TCP/IP, Master
